metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0135 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
out-of-bounds write in read_transfer_data()

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-0135` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer1 - 0.8.2-5ubuntu0.21.10.1
virgl-server - 0.8.2-5ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.2-5ubuntu0.21.10.1').
